entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: W 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
